summary: "The Battle of Nasilinna 1918" - depicting the Finnish Civil War from the White army's point of view. Lieutenant Melin's soldiers mission is to penetrate the heart of the city and overtake the Nasilinna Palace from the Reds.
cast: Nicke Lignell|Anton Häggblom|Petter Kevin|Willhelm Grotenfelt|Thomas Holm|Mathias Asplund|Markus Wilson|Mike Nordlund|Fredrik Westblom|Anders Ek|Axel Hanses|Frank Nylund|David Grandell|Roy Mäki-Fränti|Jan Holm|Kevin Smulter|Andears Swahn|Kristian Snellman|Johan Kammonen|Robin Höglund|Ahti Jokinen|Otto Kanerva|Antti Mikkola|Reidar Palmgren|Tanjalotta Räikkä|Annukka Välkki|Anna Alkiomaa|Jarno Suomela|Karoliina Blackburn|Perttu Pesä|Tomi Salmela|Laura Kuusa|Minttu Kauppila|Kaisa-Leena Koskenkorva|Timothy Pilotti|Mika Nuojua|Nina Olaussen|Pekka Milonoff|Staffan von Martens|Juha Ruokola|Gustaf Mannerheim
keywords: breaking the fourth wall|breaking the fourth wall by talking to the audience|military officer|army|military
title: Taistelu Näsilinnasta 1918
